description: A delicious summery dessert with grilled mango, and homemade lime and coconut vegan ice-cream. It will delight all your guests.
keywords: Grilled Mango With Lime Syrup & Vegan Coconut Ice-cream
name: Grilled Mango With Lime Syrup & Vegan Coconut Ice-cream Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, heat a barbecue grill or chargrill pan over high heat. Spray mango with oil and sprinkle with extra sugar. Grill mango for 2 minutes on each side or until charred. Serve mango with scoops of ice-cream and mint.
